name: MERN Stack LMS / Learning managment system with next13
description: Welcome to the MERN stack Multi Vendor Ecommerce startup series. In this series, you will learn how to build a startup project with the power of MERN and other latest technologies like tailwind CSS, socket io, redux toolkit, etc. This is a free MERN stack startup series that you will not find on youtube and Udemy right now. support me: https://www. buymeacoffee.com/shahriariarsajeeb Connects with me Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/shahriar_sajeeb Gmail: support@becodemy.com #mern_stack #nodejs #tailwindoss #socketio #becodemy # Multi Vendor MERN Stack E-commerce project With All functionalities absolutely for beginners For business inquiries: sponsorship@becodemy.com
tags: MERN, LMS, next13, typescript, node js redis

benefits.title: You will be able to build a full stack multivendor Ecommerce website
You will learn the best practices of MERN stack
You will learn how to build a chatting app with the power of socket io and MERN stack

prerequisites.title: You need basic knowledge of MERN stack
You need to complete any simple MERN project before
You need knowledge of full stack like how to create backend server how it's work and how to connect in frontend
